sentences.en: A tyrant will always find a pretext for his tyranny.
sentences.cn: 暴君总可以为自己找到暴政的藉口.

sentences.en: Does he deliberately set out to be a tyrant?
sentences.cn: 他从头就打算当暴君的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her grandfather was a tyrant who insisted on absolute silence at the dinner table.
sentences.cn: 她祖父是个专横的人,坚持吃饭时绝对禁止讲话.

sentences.en: In Xiangzi's eyes, Fourth Master Liu could be compared to Huang the Tyrant.
sentences.cn: 在祥子眼里, 刘四爷可以算作黄天霸.

sentences.en: Never will they bend to the will of a tyrant.
sentences.cn: 他们绝不屈从任何暴君的意志.

sentences.en: Tell begged the tyrant to have him make this test of his skill.
sentences.cn: 台尔请求暴君不要用这个办法来检验他的技艺.

sentences.en: The country had long been ruled by tyrants.
sentences.cn: 这个国家长期受暴君统治。

sentences.en: The guy in charge was the typical smalltown tyrant.
sentences.cn: 管事者专横霸道，典型的小地方人。

sentences.en: The people were trodden under foot by the tyrant.
The story goes that William Tell killed the tyrant with an arrow.
sentences.cn: 传说威廉·泰尔用箭射死了暴君.

sentences.en: The surrender knelled the downfall of the tyrant.
sentences.cn: 投降宣告了暴君的垮台.

sentences.en: The tyrant oppressed the conquered peoples.
sentences.cn: 这个暴君压迫被征服的各民族.

sentences.en: The tyrant throttled freedom in his country.
sentences.cn: 那暴君在国内压制自由.

sentences.en: The tyrant trod on the neck of his people.
sentences.cn: 那个暴君骑在人民头上作威作福.

sentences.en: The tyrant who oppressed the people was finally overthrown.
sentences.cn: 压迫人民的暴君终于被推翻了.
对于暴虐者反应也是暴虐行动.

trans.tran_cn: 专制统治者，暴君，（古希腊的）僭主，专横的人
trans.tran_en: a ruler who has complete power and uses it in a cruel and unfair way
